item.description:
Stump Trivia with DAN THE MAN is always a good time.  The Onion offers $2 burgers, but as we have discovered, no bread or desserts but we make sure vices are covered!!

 

Those that will be wanting dinner should arrive around 6:30 p.m. and order up some food. (You pay for what you eat/drink). Seating fills up QUICKLY! Stump Trivia starts around 7:30 p.m.

For those not familiar, Stump Trivia is a fun, FREE competitive team trivia game played in the bar. For information about The Pickled Onion, including directions and menu, click http://pickledonionbeverly.com/. Can't beat their $2 special for burgers.

 

We can have up to 6 people on a team so if more than 6 attending we will have 2 teams.
item.how_to_find_us: Usually along the wall on right as you walk in corner door
item.name: TRIVIA AT THE ONION
